house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1997 has 5 bedroom(s), 4 bath(s) , 3 car garage. Rooms include dining room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, patio, fireplace.
house_listing.residential_listing_-_additional_feature: Breakfast Bar, Breakfast Room, Cable TV, Ceiling Fan(s), CentralVacuum, Dishwasher, Eat In Kitchen, Great Room, Guest Room, KitchenIsland, Microwave, Pantry, Wet Bar
